text: The Object of My Affection is a 1998 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Nicholas Hytner and was based on the 1987 novel of the same name by Stephen McCauley. It stars Jennifer Aniston, Paul Rudd, Alan Alda, Allison Janney, Tim Daly, Nigel Hawthorne, Hayden Panettiere, Steve Zahn, Joan Copeland and Mike Judge. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1998 romantic comedy movies Category:1998 romantic drama movies Category:1998 comedy-drama movies Category:1998 LGBT movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Pregnancy movies Category:Movies about surrogacy Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Hytner
title: The Object of My Affection
